name: JAVA Adapter
content:
# Java (Maven) Adapter

**Style & Structure**
- Google Java Style; small cohesive classes; prefer composition; avoid static singletons; clear package structure.

**Testing**
- JUnit 5 (Jupiter), parameterized tests; Mockito/fakes; deterministic tests.

**Build & Quality**
- Maven conventional layout; scoped/pinned deps; sensible plugin config (Surefire, Failsafe).
- Lint/format: Spotless + google-java-format; static analysis with SpotBugs/PMD/Checkstyle if configured.

**Runbook**
```
mvn -q -DskipTests=false test
mvn -q -T1C verify
mvn -q spotless:apply
mvn -q spotbugs:check checkstyle:check pmd:check   # if configured
```

**Security & Performance**
- Validate inputs; avoid leaking secrets; set timeouts on HTTP/DB clients; prefer bounded thread pools.

**References**
- Google Java Style — https://google.github.io/styleguide/javaguide.html
- JUnit 5 — https://junit.org/junit5/
- Maven — https://maven.apache.org/guides/
